name: OR_LNLG_PRE_SKCMTS
description: This table stores the value of the Pre-op skin comments (I ORM 790) item. It  is used to hold additional comments about the patient's pre-op skin condition.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREOP_SKIN_CMTS
columns.description: The comments for the pre-operative (pre-op) skin condition.
